page.title: 03MY DAD by Lindsay Smith.
page.content: I am Lindsay Smith and my dad works in the Stoneywood paper-mill 5 miles N of Aberdeen.He works night shift or during the day.At night his hours are 18:00_06:00 or 06:00_14:00.If he works during the day his hours are 14:00- 20:00.His days off are on a roster. On his days off he goes to the Stoneywood social club and plays a game of squash.When he is finished his game he goes to the bar to have a drink.I sometimes have to wash his smelly socks!In the social club there is also a dining-room where he can have a bar-supper.You have to be an employee of the Stoneywood Mill to be admitted.You need a special membership card to get in (or you can borrow a friend's card)!The card has got a special number on it. With this card you can let yourself and two other people in by the automatic door.
